Author: xosfx
Text: I would wish for illnesses all the time that would make me loose weight. I wanted to get worms even at one point so I could eat and loose weight. I got jealous of people who were ill even, and yeah, it's the most guilt inducing thing ever. I really do think I'm a horrible, bad person. it's nice to know though, there's someone else here who feels the same. I thought I was the only one having all these fucked up thoughts.
